titleStmt.title: The justice of peace: or a vindication of peace from several late pamphlets, written by Mr. Congreve, Dennis, &c. In doggrel verse. Written at the request of a young lady, and dedicated to her. By a poet.
titleStmt.author: Poet, fl. 1697.

notesStmt.note: A reply to "The birth of the muse" by William Congreve and "The nuptials of Britain's genius and fame" by John Dennis.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
